txt.en: 'Greetings [placeholder], as glad as I am to have more help here given how things are going, we have need of more experienced warriors, and I would not see you needlessly slain on our behalf.\n\n'Nonetheless, I have received a missive from an old friend of mine - Constable Bram Ashleaf - out in the Lone-lands. It seems that the usual lawlessness out there has become unmanagable, and he is looking for brave souls to aid him in bringing it back under control. I can at least provide you with a quick mount for the journey should you wish to try your luck at the Forsaken Inn, where he is quartered?'

'So, you've decided to go lend a hand to Constable Ashleaf?

'That's just as well - things are getting dicey around here and I wouldn't want to see a promising hero such as yourself cut down before you're ready to face the darkness that's looming over Trestlebridge.'

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: Completing this quest will immediately send you to the Forsaken Inn in the Lone-lands - getting back is another matter...</rgb>

Captain Trotter of Trestlebridge has received a message from an old companion of his -- Constable Bram Ashleaf out in the Lone-lands -- asking for help dealing with a wave of lawlessness and worse.\n\nSpeak with Constable Ashleaf on his behalf and see what aid you can offer him.
Speak with Captain Trotter in Trestlebridge to requisition a fast horse to the Forsaken Inn in the western Lonelands.
